description:
Everything you love, now at your fingertips!

SHEIN is an affordable online shopping platform offering rich items and trendy goods. Discovering pretty items, trying new things and sharing with others,  SHEIN is dedicated to meet all your needs in life and works as your one-stop shopping destination! We take pride in satisfying our customers and bringing them the best shopping experience.

Inspire yourself with SHEIN right now!

Save you more
- Register and get £3 includes sale
- Free limited-time delivery and free returns within 30 Days（*conditions apply）
- Daily flash sales on many items 

Wide selections
- Fun, easy shopping with wide selections
- Browse by New Arrivals, Trends, Category, Best Sellers and more

Considerate services
- Get first access to sale alerts and promotional discounts
- Now accepting PayPal and major Credit Cards 
- Style now, pay later! Choose Afterpay to pay in 4 interest-free payments.
- 24/7 Customer Service and Live Chat available

Contact us:
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/SHEINOFFICIAL/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sheinofficial/
Email: dispute@shein.com


The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

Shop on Temu for exclusive offers. 

No matter what you're looking for, Temu has you covered, including fashion, home decor, handmade crafts, beauty & cosmetics, clothing, shoes, and more.

Download Temu today and enjoy incredible deals daily.

WIDE SELECTION
Discover thousands of new products and shops.

CONVENIENCE
Fast and secure checkout.
Free shipping & returns within 90 days.
*Other conditions may apply

Visit temu.com or follow us on:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/temu/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@temu 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shoptemu
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@temu

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

app_name: 拼多多 - 多多买菜，百亿补贴
developer: Shanghai Xunmeng Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
拼多多——多实惠，多乐趣

拼多多，社交新电商，更懂消费者的手机购物APP。8亿用户在此拼团，享受更高性价比的生活。和你的家人、朋友、邻居一起拼，品质商品更低价，包邮送到家，分享实惠，分享乐趣。

-多多买菜
1、依托拼多多全新的农产品上行物流体系，一键直达全国超过1000个农产品产区。
2、从田间到餐桌，避免中间环节损耗，百亿补贴加专项补贴，买菜更划算。
3、手机变成菜篮子，精选全国及海外农产区产地优质好货，覆盖各类生活必需品。
4、足不出户为家庭轻松选购次日生鲜，拿起手机选购，带着蔬果回家。

-更懂生活，好货不必贵
1、品类丰富：覆盖全品类品牌商品。小百货9.9包邮，轻松提升日常幸福感，品牌商品更低价，助你完成美好生活梦想。
2、百亿补贴：精选补贴全网热销品牌商品，直接降价，购物不必做算术题。
3、产地好货：源头好货产地直达，从农田到餐桌，从车间到小区，中国制造四十年产业经验为你敞开。
4、正品保障：假一赔十，品牌商品正品险，海关全程监督。

-分享乐趣，购物不孤单
1、发现好物，与好友共同分享，体验发现低价好货的乐趣。
2、和志同道合的好友拼单，或参与万人团，与8亿拼多多用户一起拼。拼团享受更低价，组团购物不孤单。
3、和朋友玩转小游戏。好朋友，就要一起栽种，一起收获。
4、为好友呈现你的真实点评，为真朋友说出真体验。

-产地直播，商家陪你看海
1、看数百万真实商家产地直播。看红薯从地里挖出，看菠萝的海，看一双鞋如何从生产线走到你面前。
2、市县长代言各产业带好货。市长县长精选本地产业带尖货，化身拼多多主播为你在线答疑。

-多多视频，有趣内容刷不停
1、魔法视频、超多滤镜、新奇特效、一键跟拍，出大片如此简单！
2、生活妙招、搞笑视频、美食菜谱、精彩直播，想看的这里都有！
3、高清画质、全屏沉浸、海量视频、智能推荐，多实惠更多乐趣！

因为倾听，所以更懂你

官方微信：拼多多（pinduoduo2015）
官方微博：@拼多多
客服电话：400-8822-528
消费者固话热线：021-53395288
官网：http://www.pinduoduo.com

New upgrade: Taobao English is now available in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, Canada, Cambodia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Macau, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Kyrgyzstan, Georgia and Mongolia!For other regions, stay tuned! We're working hard to upgrade for you, in the meantime, you can still shop in our Chinese interface!

Taobao (iPhone version) offers a convenient and engaging shopping experience, specifically designed for iPhone users.

As a leading e-commerce platform in China, Taobao provides an extensive selection of products, catering to the diverse and personalized needs of over 1 billion users. Known as the "Omnipotent Taobao", it stands as a trusted destination for quality and variety for its users. 

Every day, consumers from around the globe visit Taobao, eager to explore more products for their daily needs and keep up with the latest trends!Product Features:

1. Extensive Range of Global Brands
Discover thousands of brands and retailers, offering both Chinese and international products to consumers worldwide.

2. Diverse Offerings from Small and Medium-sized Vendors
Access tens of millions of unique products from small and medium-sized businesses, as well as innovative entrepreneurs, showcasing creative and thoughtfully designed items.

3. Safe and Seamless Shopping Experience
We've integrated local e-wallets and credit card payments in selected regions, along with cross-border direct shipping options. Some products also feature free shipping and/or local return services, ensuring a secure, joyful, and effortless shopping journey.

4. NEW English Interface Now Available!
The English interface is available in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, and Cambodia. Simply update your language settings. We're working hard to expand this feature to more regions soon!

5. Year-Round Promotional Activities
Take advantage of our numerous promotional events throughout the year. Enjoy discounted prices and exclusive platform benefits, making it easy to find high-quality products at even better prices.

1688APP, China’s leading wholesale marketplace now officially available in Vietnam/Kazakhstan. We belong to the business of Alibaba Group,  the global B2B procurement and Sourcing hub for millions of business sellers.
Need Factory-Direct products with lower prices and stable quality? Now you can find all of them on 1688, and of course, buy more to save more!
Custom products, consumer goods, industrial items, accessories, electronics, raw materials and so on. Discover Authentic Products come directly from Chinese factories. Also, making it easy for you to negotiate with factories and suppliers. 
We customised wholesale purchasing services for global buyers, Multi-language, Direct and Reliable Logistics, and International Payment Options have been integrated into our new APP.
Register now to enjoy Limited Discounts and Hassle-free  Global Sourcing Experience!

Plug® is your connection to the latest iPhones and more

Our mission is to take pre owned devices and turn them into certified refurbished devices. Tap into the plug family, anytime, anywhere, and all in one spot — the plug app.

Get instant updates, track your orders, find any item in stock, and get inspired by our users all over the world!

With the Plug app, you will be able to do the following:

1. Choose directly from plugs inventory, which includes the best prices.
2. Access customer care: Order tracking and after-sales support.
3. Receive notifications and updates on exclusive deals
4. Receive updates on what is going on at Plug and how we are helping the environment
We have the best deals on pre-owned devices.

- All devices are fully tested, work perfectly, and are backed with a 1-year warranty
- Installment payments available with Shop Pay Installments
- Free 2 Day shipping and you can track your package directly in the app
- 30-day hassle-free return policy

Comprehensive

Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.

Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 

Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.sg from a single app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
 
For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

Shop online with Takealot, South Africa’s #1 shopping app and get your order delivered to your door with safe, contactless delivery, or collect at a Takealot Pickup Point at a time and place that is convenient to you! 

Find amazing savings on everyday essentials, groceries, sports equipment, body and hair care, tech and more! Get everything you need delivered from one shopping app.

Buy great products at great prices through one simple, secure online shopping experience. Find great deals on pet care, toiletries and get your groceries delivered safely and securely.

Browse millions of products across 28 departments from household cleaning, baby care, and coffee essentials to electronics, books, gaming and first aid - plus much, much more. Shop around and save items you want to custom lists for later. Essentials for mom and baby are available at our every day low prices.

Shop for kids toys like Lego, Fisher Price and Barbie. Or, shop for the whole family and buy board games for hours of fun!

Order on your mobile in less than a minute, with easy, safe payment options, including credit, debit and Instant EFT. Takealot lets you shop securely, with biometric face or thumbprint ID.

Unless your password is “password”, you’re going to love this nifty new login method. Simply use fingerprint or facial recognition to quickly and easily start shopping on SA’s #1 online shopping app.

Get your goodies delivered to your door anywhere in South Africa, even on weekends. Deliveries are contact-free, so simply pick up the package when it’s dropped off at your doorstep.

Please note: certain products, such as large appliances, are not eligible for collection. These products must be delivered to a home or business address.

We promise safe, reliable touchless delivery on every order – free when you spend over R650 – and hassle-free returns if something isn’t right. T&Cs apply.

Takealot: Shop Anything You Can Imagine.
Download now to get everything you like to buy, delivered right to your door!

TAKEALOT FEATURES:

SALES & DISCOUNTS
• Find great deals on everyday essentials!
• Pet care, vitamins, cleaning supplies, groceries, tech, mom and baby, beauty & much more

ONLINE SHOPPING MADE EASY
• Browse, search and buy millions of Takealot products across 28 departments any time, anywhere
• Easy, safe payment options including Instant EFT, credit & debit cards and more
• Send and share links to products via email, SMS, Facebook, Twitter and more
• Secure login with face or thumbprint ID biometrics

SECURE DELIVERY
• Fast & reliable delivery to your door, anywhere in South Africa
• Contactless delivery
• FREE SHIPPING & COLLECTIONS when you spend R650 or more
• Shop and track your order every step of the way, from checkout to your front door, right from the app
• Hassle-free returns if something isn’t right

GREAT DEALS
• Price-check items you see in stores using our barcode scanner to find the best deal
• Filter deals by department

MILLIONS OF PRODUCTS
Browse and buy unbeatable deals in:
• Electronics
• Mobile, Cellular & GPS
• Cameras
• Home, Furniture & Appliances
• Books and eBooks
• Health & Wellness
• Beauty & Makeup
• Medicine
• Household Cleaning
• Mom & Baby
• Office & Stationery
• Pet Supplies
• Groceries
• Toiletries
• Home fitness
• Kitchenware
• Coffee essentials
• Body & Hair Care
• And more!

Shop for anything you can imagine and get it from your fingertips to your front door. Download the takealot.com mobile app today and find everything you need in one place!

Wildberries — это цифровая платформа, где можно найти почти всё: от пушистых тапочек-единорогов до стиральной машины. Встречи с вами ждут больше 500 миллионов самых разных товаров. 80% заказов привозим уже на следующий день после покупки — не хотим, чтобы вы долго ждали.

• Заказывайте в наши пункты выдачи в 7 странах мира: России, Узбекистане, Казахстане, Кыргызстане, Беларуси, Армении, Грузии. Мы работаем в мегаполисах и регионах, а значит, всегда где-то поблизости: всего уже больше 36 000 пунктов. В России есть курьерская доставка, а местами доставляем в постаматы.

• Оплачивайте удобным способом: например, WB Кошельком со скидкой или картой. В большинстве случаев предоплата не нужна: деньги спишутся только после того, как заберёте заказ.

• Экономьте больше с нашими распродажами. Мы бережно собрали акции дня в отдельный раздел, чтобы не пришлось искать. У нас всегда есть скидки: от самого Wildberries, от продавцов и ваша личная. 

• Находите именно то, что хотели, и даже больше — в приложении можно настроить фильтры по цене, рейтингу и популярности. Сортируйте по размеру, бренду или цвету. Ищите похожие вещи по кнопке на фото товара и в рекомендациях.

• Откладывайте товары, которые нравятся. Пока думаете, ждёте снижения цены или просто хотите купить что-то к важной дате — добавляйте в отложенные. Товар будет под рукой, когда понадобится.

• Скачивайте приложение Wildberries и покупайте то, что захочется, в одном месте и в любое время. Если в полночь вы вспомнили, что забыли купить корм для кота или подарок близким — можете на нас рассчитывать!

Ozon — самый известный и крупный маркетплейс в России.
На Ozon можно заказать всё, что вам нужно: электронику и бытовую технику, детские товары и детское питание, игры, игрушки, канцтовары, книги, одежду и обувь, товары для дома и сада, антиквариат, продукты питания, безрецептурные лекарства, авиа- и ж/д билеты и забронировать отели. 
     
Приложение Ozon — это выгодные и удобные покупки в вашем смартфоне, а ещё:
- работаем 24/7, поэтому можно делать покупки в любое время;
- десятки миллионов товаров в онлайн-каталоге;
- интересные предложения, скидочные купоны, дополнительные скидки, промокоды, акции и лучшие цены для постоянных покупателей;
- доставка по всей России и за рубеж.

Если хочется чего-то свеженького – закажите продукты на Ozon fresh! Мы быстро доставим вкусные продукты для всей семьи: от помидоров с рынка и мраморного стейка до фермерского творога и теплого круассана. А ещё у нас вы всегда найдёте скидки и специальные предложения. Мы уже есть в Москве, Санкт-Петербурге, Краснодаре, Ростове-на-Дону и во многих других городах России. Выбирайте свежее – заказывайте любимые продукты на Ozon fresh.

Бронируйте авиа, ж/д билеты и отели на Ozon! Это не только удобно, но и выгодно: вы можете оплатить до 99% стоимости билетов баллами Ozon. Сервисом уже пользуются более 4 миллионов человек.

Служба поддержки на связи 24/7. Вам помогут решить любой вопрос: вернуть или переоформить билет, добавить багаж или исправить данные пассажира, отменить или изменить бронь отеля.
 
Мы постоянно обновляем ассортимент и сохраняем выгодные цены. Делаем подборки популярных товаров, а покупатели оставляют отзывы о покупках.
Ежедневно мы сообщаем о выгодных предложениях, актуальных скидках, промокодах и распродажах. Собираем весь ассортимент товаров с лучшей стоимостью в каталог скидок и регулярно запускаем рекламные акции, в которых можно выиграть ценные призы.
Выбирайте товары и заказывайте их буквально в один клик или отложите понравившиеся в «Избранное»: приложение сохранит ваш вишлист, и вы сможете вернуться к покупке товаров позже.
Оставайтесь дома, делайте заказы, получайте скидки, а Озон привезет все ваши покупки. При заказе в постамат или пункт выдачи заказов через приложение стоимость доставки — 0 рублей.
Вы можете ознакомиться с нашим ассортиментом товаров и выгодных предложений прямо сейчас — скачайте приложение Ozon и наслаждайтесь онлайн-шоппингом!

In addition, Zara's children's collection includes its Edited/customisable section, a selection of customisable clothing and accessories that is updated weekly. 


In addition to our permanent collections, with our Zara App you can find all our special launches, our beauty category and our lingerie line. 

Other utilities of the Zara App are:  
-	Favourites: Use your favourites list to save all the clothes and accessories you like.
-	Easy, intuitive and fast tracking of orders and returns. Track your order in each part of the process. 
-	Find your nearest Zara store. 
-	Activate notifications and receive information about new arrivals, launchings, special collections... 


Store mode 
-	Use your application in ""store mode"" when you are shopping in any of our stores and use all its features to improve your experience. 


Zara QR:
Use your QR on the Zara App for: 
-	Having associated all of your purchases online and at physical stores. At a physical store, identify yourself at the till with your Zara QR code and request an e-receipt.
-	In-store returns for both online and in-store purchases.
-	Collect all of your online orders at a physical store.

CDEK Delivery & Parcel Tracker App: Your Ultimate Package Management Solution!

Are you tired of the complexities with tracking your parcels and deliveries? Say no more! CDEK is here to make revolutionary changes in your delivery and parcel tracking experience. We understand that package management can be a real challenge, and we've designed this app to simplify your life.

- User-Friendly Parcel Tracker Say goodbye to package tracking hassles! CDEK puts the power to track your parcels at any time and place. Whether it's a business package, a personal delivery, or even an international shipment, you can easily track it all from one convenient place. No more uncertainty about your package arrival time – you'll always know its exact location and when to expect it with our parcel tracker.

- Flexible Delivery Options We offer a range of choice tailored to your needs. Select the courier delivery, convenient collection points, or parcel locker drop-off locations. We're glad to give you the flexibility to decide how and where you want your packages to be delivered. And if you're in a hurry, our express delivery service ensures your parcel reaches its destination in record time. 

- Your Parcel, Your Schedule Life can get busy, and we understand that. That's why our app lets you schedule deliveries at your convenience. Choose your preferred delivery time, and we'll make sure it happens when it suits you. No more waiting around for the courier – it's in control, especially with our parcel tracker feature.

- Earn Rewards We value your loyalty, and our Cashback Program is our way of showing it. Earn cashback points for every delivery and payment via the app. You can use these points to cover up to 99% of your future costs. Besides, our CDEK ID feature streamlines the process, allowing you to receive parcels without needing a passport.

- International Deliveries Made Simple Now, with CDEK Delivery & Parcel Tracker app, you can make orders from abroad, pay in your currency, and leave the rest to us. Fast courier delivery to your doorstep or other services are available – the global connection is easy now.

- Seamless Mobile Experience Our app is designed with your needs in mind. Creating a delivery order is a breeze. Simply enter your shipment details, shipping and pickup addresses, and choose your preferred payment method. Want to stay updated? You can enable push notifications for real-time delivery status alerts from CDEK parcel tracker.

- Convenient Payment Options Whether you prefer cash, credit card, or other online payment methods, you can choose your more convenient way for you to do it.

- Find Nearby Delivery Points Locating the nearest parcel CDEK points has never been easier. Our in-app map integrated with the parcel tracker guides you effortlessly, providing working hours and helping you plan the best route. With CDEK ID integration, you can receive your packages without the paperwork routine.

- Leave Your Review Your feedback matters to us. After each delivery, you have the opportunity to rate and review our parcel service. Your input helps us continuously improve and provide the best possible experience, whether it's parcel tracking, courier delivery, etc.

- About Us CDEK is a leading full-service logistics company with over two decades of experience. Our mission is to simplify the delivery process for businesses and individuals alike. We've earned our reputation as the top choice for Eastern Europe, offering a vast network of over 4,000 offices and 6000+ dedicated couriers.

Join Us Today Are you ready to revolutionize your parcel management experience? Install the CDEK Delivery & Parcel Tracker app now and take control of your deliveries. Say goodbye to the hassles and hello to seamless parcel management. Download the app and experience the future of delivery!

Яндекс Маркет — это маркетплейс с 50 миллионами товаров и быстрой доставкой.

Техника и электроника, одежда и обувь, мебель и товары для дома, всё для ремонта и всё для уюта, косметика, игрушки, товары для спорта, для животных, для творчества. Популярные, брендовые, оригинальные. Всё это ищите на Яндекс Маркете, и оно здесь найдётся. 

ОРИГИНАЛЬНЫЕ ТОВАРЫ
Качественные и подлинные. Всё потому, что мы тщательно проверяем продавцов, а они дорожат своим рейтингом.

НИЖЕ РЫНКА И ЛЮБИМЫЕ КАТЕГОРИИ
Маркет сам подсказывает, как покупать выгоднее. Значок «ниже рынка» подсвечивает товары с самыми низкими ценами, чтобы вам не пришлось сравнивать стоимость в разных интернет-магазинах. А любимые категории дают скидки до 70% — вам нужно только выбрать свои.

ОЧЕНЬ УМНАЯ ЛЕНТА РЕКОМЕНДАЦИЙ
Она чувствует и предугадывает, какой из товаров вам понравится. И может даже вдохновить вас на что-нибудь: сделать подарок без повода или завести новое хобби.

НАСТОЯЩИЕ ОТЗЫВЫ ОТ НАСТОЯЩИХ ЛЮДЕЙ
Покупатели Маркета — лучшие советчики. Они честно рассказывают, что понравилось, а что не очень. Так вы сможете узнать всё про товар ещё до его покупки.

ДОСТАВКА ПО КЛИКУ
Работает очень просто. Выберите день доставки, а когда будете готовы принять заказ, кликните в приложении. 15–30 минут — и курьер у вас.

КУРЬЕРСКАЯ ДОСТАВКА
Удобная и быстрая. Быстрая и удобная. Курьер приедет как раз тогда, когда вы его ждали. Или ещё раньше, если закажете экспресс.

ПРОСТОЙ ВОЗВРАТ
Если товар не подошёл или вы просто передумали, оформляете возврат онлайн и получаете деньги назад. Вот и все дела.

ОТЗЫВЧИВАЯ КОМАНДА ПОДДЕРЖКИ
Задавайте вопросы в чате — в Маркете поддержка с настоящими людьми. Быстрая, внимательная и всегда поможет разобраться.

УЮТНЫЕ ПВЗ
С просторными примерочными и приветливыми сотрудниками. Заглядывайте.

Теперь вы всё-всё знаете про Яндекс Маркет, он же маркетплейс, интернет-магазин или, как ещё говорят, онлайн-магазин. Вы даже знаете, что на Маркете есть техника и электроника, одежда и обувь, мебель и товары для дома, косметика и духи. Да и чего только нет. И всё это в простом и удобном приложении, которое как раз можно скачать здесь.

description:

Get the Woolworths app and enjoy quality and difference whenever, wherever you need it.

It’s everything you’ve come to expect from South Africa’s best-loved retailer, and there’s so much more to come.

Shop on the go
Browse, search and shop fashion, beauty, homeware and food wherever you are, and choose the delivery option that works for you:

Standard delivery: Choose your date and time and we’ll deliver to your door. 

Click and Collect: Shop Woolies food and collect it from a Woolies store when and where it’s convenient for you.

Dash Delivery: Shop Woolies food and get your order delivered fast, fresh and same day!

Stay a step ahead
Turn on push notifications to be the first to know about exclusive offers and promotions, and keep connected with messages and news in your app inbox.

Stay inspired
Get the latest style trends and mouth-watering recipes as soon as you open the app.

Ratings and reviews
Find out what customers are saying about their recent purchases and share your thoughts with our Woolies community.

Virtual try on
Try before you buy and get the latest, and best, look with our virtual try on service.  Available on selected beauty products using your device’s camera and remember to smile for that selfie! 

Scan a product 
Get instant product info when you scan a product in a store or at home.  Add to your basket for quick and easy shopping.

Find in store
Need something special right now?  Our app can tell you what we have in stock at all your nearest stores, so you can plan your shopping journey better than ever and be sure to get what you need.

.Shopping list
Add any products to your in-app shopping list while you’re browsing. It’s easy to use and so convenient when you’re on the go. 


Find your store
Use our store locator to find your nearest store, its contact details and opening hours. iOS users, open directions to your chosen store in Apple Maps.

Check your account
Woolies card holders, check your account balance, available funds, next payment date, and your last 20 transactions on the go! You can also view your full statement and make your payment wherever you are.

Shop with your virtual store card
Whether you’ve left your store card at home or you’re waiting for your new card to be delivered, you can use your Woolies Virtual Store Card in our app.

Be secure
Can’t find your Woolies store card but think you might? Freeze it in our app so no one can use it. Definitely lost your card or it’s been stolen? Block it and arrange a replacement in our app. 

Get funds
You can apply for a store card, credit card, a loan or a credit limit increase straight from the app! Remember, if you have a Woolworths Personal Loan, you can request funds to be transferred into your account at any time.

Get rewarded
Get personalised WRewards virtual card and vouchers in the app. Cashiers will scan the digital WRewards card and vouchers on your phone at checkout. You can also check your tier status, WRewards savings, and your next tier goal.

Easy log in
Use the same sign in details for our website and app. 

Get in touch
You’ll find our contact details, email address and FAQs in the app. You can chat to our Financial Services team direct from the app.

You’ve found the ultimate shopping companion. The Simon® app has everything you need for the perfect trip to one of our 200 Simon Malls®, Simon Mills®, or Simon Premium Outlets® locations. 

Top Features Include:

● Access 200 interactive 3D mall maps to help you navigate your local Simon shopping center, with blue-dot navigation enabled in select centers
● Join Simon+™ for cash, points and perks - Simon's new rewards program that makes every shopping trip count
● Search for in-store & online products via Simon Search®, and then filter your product results so that you can quickly find out more details about items that interest you
● Works seamlessly on all iPhone, iPod Touch or iPad screen sizes
● Check out the latest deals, news & events available at your favorite center
● Find the stores, dining and entertainment options that you love at all Simon Malls, Mills or Premium Outlets shopping centers across the country
● View Family at Simon perks, deals, events, stores, and amenities at participating centers
● Add deals and events that interest you directly to your calendar so that you'll never miss out
● Find movie trailers, times, and tickets at your favorite shopping locations
● Access dining menus, reservations, and food delivery options for on-center restaurants
● See what available shopper services and amenities any given mall offers
● Opt into local center push notifications to stay up-to-date on what's happening at your favorite shopping mall or outlet
● Quickly look-up center hours, driving directions, transportation options, local weather conditions, and mall contact information

The Simon app supports Simon regional malls, Mills shopping centers & Simon Premium Outlets centers all across America including, but not limited to, those in the following U.S. cities & states:

Atlanta, GA, Austin, TX, Boston, MA, Charlette, SC, Chicago, IL, Cleveland, OH, Dallas, TX, Denver, CO, Houston, TX, Indianapolis, IN, Kansas City, MO, Las Vegas, NV, Los Angeles, CA, Miami, FL, Minneapolis, MN, New York, NY, Orlando, FL, Philadelphia, PA, Phoenix, AZ, San Francisco, CA, San Jose, CA, Seattle, WA, Tampa, FL, and Washington, D.C.

Also, the Simon app now has full support and detailed mall maps for over 200 centers including, but by no means limited to the following top malls, mills & outlet centers:

The Forum Shops, Fashion Centre At Pentagon City, King of Prussia®, Del Amo Fashion Center®, Roosevelt Field®, The Galleria, Sawgrass Mills®, Woodfield Mall, Gurnee Mills®, Mall of Georgia, Town Center at Boca Raton®, Grapevine Mills®, The Florida Mall®, Brickell City Centre, Fashion Valley, SouthPark, Northshore Mall, Arundel Mills®, Lenox Square®, Potomac Mills®, Ontario Mills®, Barton Creek Square, Dadeland Mall, Stanford Shopping Center, Great Mall®, Oxford Valley Mall®, Tacoma Mall, Menlo Park Mall, Brea Mall®, Burlington Mall®, Stoneridge Shopping Center®, The Mills at Jersey Gardens, Greenwood Park Mall, Smith Haven Mall, Town Center at Cobb, Rockaway Townsquare®, Copley Place, Ross Park Mall, Arizona Mills®, St Johns Town Center™, The Domain®, Coconut Point®, Katy Mills®, Sugarloaf Mills®, Opry Mills®, Newport Centre, The Shops at Mission Viejo, Colorado Mills®, San Marcos Premium Outlets®, The Shops at Crystals, Wrentham Village Premium Outlets®, Philadelphia Premium Outlets®, Houston Premium Outlets®, North Georgia Premium Outlets®, Las Vegas North Premium Outlets®, Las Vegas South Premium Outlets®,San Francisco Premium Outlets®, Desert Hills Premium Outlets®, Seattle Premium Outlets®, Woodbury Common Premium Outlets®, Orlando International Premium Outlets® & Orlando Vineland Premium Outlets®

NOTE: Due to language requirements, we don't currently support, within the app, our center in Quebec, Canada (Premium Outlets Montréal) at this time, or any other languages other than English (EN).

Discover trendy outfits, dresses, jeans and affordable clothing with fast shipping and 1000+ new arrivals weekly. Our online shopping app brings stylish women's, curve, men's and kids’ fashion to your fingertips as the #1 most-searched fashion brand.

-----
WHY FASHION NOVA IS YOUR STYLE ESSENTIAL
-----

• 1000+ NEW ARRIVALS WEEKLY: Be the first to rock the latest trends and new clothes before anyone else. Our design team brings you trendy outfits inspired by runway looks.
• INCLUSIVE SIZING: Perfect fits for every body type with our Women's, Plus Size, Curve, Men's, and Kids collections. Our trendy clothing is designed to flatter all bodies.
• CELEBRITY-APPROVED STYLES: Worn and loved by today's biggest stars. Our trendy outfits have been featured in music videos, red carpet events, and social media posts.
• UNBEATABLE PRICES: Runway-inspired fashion at discount prices that won't break the bank. We deliver boutique-quality clothing at affordable prices.
• LIGHTNING-FAST SHIPPING: Get your must-have pieces delivered quickly to your door. Shop new clothes and have them arrive in time for the weekend.
• EASY RETURNS: Hassle-free 30-day return process to ensure your complete satisfaction with every purchase of our stylish clothes.

-----
APP FEATURES THAT ELEVATE YOUR ONLINE SHOPPING
-----

• PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS: Discover stylish clothes curated just for you based on your browsing history and preferences.
• EASY CHECKOUT: Save your details for one-tap purchasing, making buying trendy clothing faster than ever.
• EXCLUSIVE APP-ONLY DEALS: Access special discounts and flash sales first, before they're available anywhere else.
• WISH LIST: Save your favorites to shop later. Keep track of those must-have trendy pieces you want.
• ORDER TRACKING: Monitor your package from warehouse to doorstep with real-time updates on your trendy outfits.
• REAL-TIME NOTIFICATIONS: Get instant alerts on new arrivals, restocks, and exclusive flash sales.
• SECURE PAYMENT OPTIONS: Shop with confidence using multiple payment methods including installment plans.

-----
DISCOVER OUR TRENDING COLLECTIONS
-----

• FASHION NOVA: Contemporary women's styles from casual to boutique quality. From basics to statement pieces, our women's collection offers trendy outfits for every occasion.
• FASHION NOVA CURVE: Stunning plus-size fashion that celebrates every curve with stylish options. Our plus size collection features trendy clothing cut to fit.
• FASHION NOVA MEN: Streetwear and casual essentials for the modern man who appreciates quality and style. Our men's collection offers trendy outfits for day to night.
• FASHION NOVA KIDS: Miniature versions of our hottest adult styles for fashion-forward young ones.

-----
FIND YOUR PERFECT STYLE
-----

• Our app makes finding your perfect look effortless. Whether you're searching for that sexy statement piece, curve-hugging jeans, or casual streetwear, we've got you covered.
• The Fashion Nova shopping experience is designed with you in mind. Our intuitive search filters help you find the perfect trendy outfits by size, color, price, or occasion.
• Join our global community of Fashion Nova Babes! Tag @FashionNova, @FashionNovaCURVE, and #NovaBabe for a chance to be featured on our social platforms.
• Gentlemen, elevate your wardrobe with Fashion Nova Men! Tag @FashionNovaMEN and #NovaMen to showcase your streetwear style.

CONNECT WITH US:

• Instagram: @FashionNova, @FashionNovaCURVE, @FashionNovaMEN
• TikTok: @FashionNova
• X: @FashionNova
• Facebook: @FashionNova
• Snapchat: @FashionNova

Bash is home to 500+ of your most-loved brands. Featuring your favourite names in fashion, home, sports and tech - and a whole lot more for you to explore.

Packed with smart features, the Bash app creates a seamless shopping experience both in-store and online. Use the Wallet to manage your account, buy airtime/data, and purchase lifestyle vouchers, or check real-time availability with the Stock Locator.

It's shopping simplified.

That's what we call the power of together.

Интернет-магазин ювелирных украшений 585*Золотой — федеральная ювелирная сеть №1 в России! Порадуйте себя и близких подарками в одном из более 1000 магазинов по всей стране.
• Украшения из золота и серебра: кольца, серьги, цепи, браслеты, подвески, шармы, броши.
• Драгоценные камни: бриллианты, сапфиры, изумруды, гранаты, топазы, аметисты и другие.
• Ювелирные часы и брендовая оптика: Casio, Romanson, Polaroid, Ray-Ban и другие известные бренды.

Собственное производство украшений из золота 585 пробы и серебра 925 пробы с драгоценными камнями. Все изделия проходят проверку в Федеральной пробирной палате, гарантируя вам высочайшее качество. Вы всегда сможете убедиться в подлинности купленного ювелирного украшения на сайте ГИИС ДМДК по УИН, указанному на бирке.

УКРАШЕНИЯ НА ВСЕ СЛУЧАИ ЖИЗНИ
В нашем каталоге всегда найдутся идеальные подарки для любого события: обручальные и помолвочные кольца, подарки на дни рождения, юбилеи, годовщины и праздничные дни.

СКАЧАЙТЕ МОБИЛЬНОЕ ПРИЛОЖЕНИЕ
• 10 000 бонусов и подвеску за установку.
• 50 000+ изделий в каталоге: золотые и серебряные украшения на любой вкус.
• Эксклюзивные акции: специальные предложения, подарки и скидки.

Покупать с мобильным приложением — это просто!
• Выберите украшение и просмотрите подробное описание, размеры, скидки и промокоды.
• Найдите нужный размер и нажмите «Добавить в корзину».
• После добавления всех желанных украшений перейдите в раздел «Корзина». Здесь вы можете применить все действующие промокоды и списать бонусы в счёт оплаты.
• Нажмите «Оформить заказ», выберите способ получения и способ оплаты и нажмите «Оплатить».
• Ваши украшения мечты уже едут к вам!
• Включите push-уведомления и будьте в курсе всех акций, скидок и новых поступлений!

585*Золотой — это выгодные цены, акционные предложения и бонусы для всех пользователей мобильного приложения!
